marklogic.body: Â I do.Â I have horehound in the garden, and I make an old-fashioned horehound drop that seems, to us at any rate, to work as well as Ricola.Â I read a couple of studies that seem to suggest that honey beats dextromethorphan or a placebo for Coughing, and I figured what the heck?Â I can make a placebo!Â So I also make a Cough syrup out of chokecherries that we pick in the forest, honey, and a couple of other ingredients.Â Typing that all of a sudden made me feel like Laura Ingalls Wilder or something.Â Ahem.Â I would never judge someone for resorting to Five Guys for their hunger needs or even to Big Pharma for their Cough drop needs.Â I just kind of enjoy this sort of thing.
